title: Employee Management
description: Manage team members, role assignments, reporting hierarchy, and access permissions
overview: The Employee Management module is where you configure your firm's team structure. Define employees, assign operational roles, set data visibility scopes, and configure module access. This directly affects what each team member can see and do in the system.

keyFeatures.title: Employee Directory
keyFeatures.description: Complete database of all team members with contact and profile details

keyFeatures.title: Role Assignment
keyFeatures.description: Assign operational roles (Partner, Manager, Advocate, Staff) to employees

keyFeatures.title: Data Scope Configuration
keyFeatures.description: Set visibility rules: 'Own Cases', 'Team Cases', or 'All Cases'

keyFeatures.title: Module Access Control
keyFeatures.description: Restrict which modules each employee can access

keyFeatures.title: Reporting Hierarchy
keyFeatures.description: Define manager relationships for team visibility

keyFeatures.title: Billing & Default Settings
keyFeatures.description: Set default task categories, billing rates, and work preferences

directory.title: Employee List
directory.whenToUse: When adding new employees, updating profiles, or searching for team members

hierarchy.title: Team Hierarchy
hierarchy.whenToUse: When setting up or modifying the organizational structure

access.title: Access Settings
access.description: Configure data scope and module access for employees
access.whenToUse: When adjusting what employees can see and access

billing.title: Billing Settings
billing.description: Manage billing rates and default task categories
billing.whenToUse: When setting up billing configurations for team members

addEmployee.title: Add Employee
addEmployee.action: Opens employee creation form with all required fields

setManager.title: Set Manager
setManager.description: Assign a reporting manager to an employee

configureAccess.title: Configure Access
configureAccess.description: Set data scope and module permissions

quickStart.title: Add Team Members
quickStart.description: Create employee profiles for all team members with email and contact details

quickStart.title: Assign Roles
quickStart.description: Set operational roles (Partner, Manager, Advocate, Staff) for each employee

quickStart.title: Define Reporting Structure
quickStart.description: Set 'Reports To' for each employee to create the team hierarchy

quickStart.title: Configure Data Scope
quickStart.description: Choose appropriate data visibility (Own/Team/All Cases) based on role

quickStart.title: Set Module Access
quickStart.description: Select which modules each employee should have access to
